pr_title: 6912 Add option to not copy files that are present in file repository.

timeline.message: Add option to not copy files that are present in file repository.

timeline.bodyText: Hmm, maybe my BulkExistenceEnum should have EXISTS, DOES_NOT_EXIST, INVALID_HASH, instead of True, False, Invalid.
timeline.author: dannysmyda

replies.bodyText: And maybe it should be renamed FileRepoExistenceEnum and FileRepoExistenceResults
replies.author: dannysmyda

replies.bodyText: That might be better. I found the TRUE/FALSE awkward to use
replies.author: APriestman

timeline.bodyText: Are we not going to deal with if the state changes? Also, if the FileRepo is redirected to another server in the settings, this cache needs to be invalidated. Will this PortableCase object be GC'd between Case close and open?
timeline.author: dannysmyda

replies.bodyText: I just forgot to add clearing the cache to the cleanup() method. That will take care of it.
replies.author: APriestman

timeline.message: Clear out the file repo cache between runs.

timeline.bodyText: Exception containing the cause is dropped.
timeline.author: dannysmyda

timeline.bodyText: Exception containing the cause is dropped.
timeline.author: dannysmyda
